IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: ADVANCING THE INFORMATION AND COMMUNICATION TECHNOLOGY (ICT) PROFESSION.
IRS990.MissionDesc: ADVANCING THE INFORMATION AND COMMUNICATIONS TECHNOLOGY PROFESSION. BICSI PROVIDES EDUCATION AND TRAINING, CONFERENCES AND EVENTS, CREDENTIALS AND CERTIFICATION PROGRAMS, STANDARDS AND BEST PRACTICES, REFERENCE MANUALS, AND COMMUNITY AND MEMBERSHIP.
IRS990.Desc: MAGAZINES ARE DISTRIBUTED FREE TO INDIVIDUALS INVOLVED IN THE INFORMATION AND COMMUNICATIONS TECHNOLOGY INDUSTRY. THE MAGAZINE WAS PUBLISHED FOUR TIMES IN THE FISCAL YEAR 2021 WITH APPROXIMATELY 20,000 COPIES OF EACH ISSUE DISTRIBUTED.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: CONDUCT EDUCATIONAL SEMINARS ON VARIOUS INFORMATION AND COMMUNICATIONS TECHNOLOGY SYSTEMS INCLUDING REGISTERED COMMUNICATIONS DISTRIBUTION DESIGN, CUSTOMER OWNED OUTSIDE PLANT SPECIALTY, DATA CENTER DESIGN, PROJECT MANAGEMENT AND INSTALLATION TRAINING.

ProgSrvcAccomActy3Grp.Desc: BICSI MEMBERS OR OUTSIDE CONTRACTORS WRITE DISTRIBUTION METHOD MANUALS, DESIGN REFERENCE MANUALS AND INSTALLATION METHOD MANUALS. BICSI STAFF, AIDED BY INDEPENDENT CONTRACTORS, EDIT AND COORDINATE PRODUCTION BY OUTSIDE PRINTERS.

ProgSrvcAccomActyOtherGrp.Desc: BICSI, INC. SPONSORED TWO MAJOR EDUCATION CONFERENCES IN FISCAL YEAR ENDING JUNE 30, 2021. THESE CONFERENCES WERE PLANNED, MARKETED, AND CONDUCTED BY BICSI, INC. THE REGISTERED COMMUNICATION DISTRIBUTIONS DESIGNER (RCDD) PROGRAM IS CONSIDERED A MAJOR PROGRAM SERVICE OF BICSI. THE RCDD PROGRAM TESTS BICSI MEMBERS. BICSI PERMITS SELECTED MEMBERS TO USE THE PROFESSIONAL DESIGNATION OF RCCD IN THEIR BUSINESS AFFAIRS UPON COMPLETION OF THE APPROPRIATE CRITERIA AND PAYMENT OF FEES.

Form990PartVIISectionAGrp.TitleTxt: EUROPE MIDDLE EAST AFRICA REGION DIRECTOR
US SOUTH CENTRAL REGION DIRECTOR UNTIL 3/2021
VICE PRESIENT OF GLOBAL DEVELOPMENT & SUPPORT

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: AS PART OF THE PROGRAM SERVICE, BICSI INC. PROVIDES EDUCATIONAL MATERIAL AND HOSTS SEMINARS ON DATA COMMUNICATIONS CABLING INDUSTRY.
BICSI INC.'S ACTIVITY IN EACH COUNTRY PROVIDES TRAINING AND QUALIFICATIONS FOR THE DATA COMMUNICATIONS CABLING INDUSTRY.

TRAVEL AND TRAVEL WITH A COMPANION: BOARD MEMBERS AND MANAGEMENT ARE ALLOWED TO FLY BUSINESS CLASS FOR ALL INTERNATIONAL TRIPS GREATER THAN SIX HOURS. THEY ALSO HAVE THE OPTION TO FLY COACH INSTEAD OF BUSINESS CLASS AND THE OPTION TO TRAVEL WITH A COMPANION. COMPANION TRAVEL IS INCLUDED ON FORM W-2 FOR STAFF AND FORM 1099 FOR BOARD MEMBERS. DISCRETIONARY SPENDING ACCOUNT: EACH BOARD MEMBER HAS A DISCRETIONARY SPENDING ACCOUNT OF VARIOUS AMOUNTS ASSIGNED TO EACH MEMBER.

PAUL WEINTRAUB RECEIVED A SEVERANCE AND 457B PAYOUT IN THE AMOUNT OF $101,054 IN CALENDAR YEAR 2020, WHICH WAS INCLUDED IN HIS TAXABLE COMPENSATION. JOHN D. CLARK RECEIVED A 457B PAYOUT IN THE AMOUNT OF $238,431 IN CALENDAR YEAR 2020, WHICH WAS INCLUDED IN HIS TAXABLE COMPENSATION. BETTY ECKERBRECHT RECEIVED A 457B PAYOUT IN THE AMOUNT OF $14,466 IN CALENDAR YEAR 2020, WHICH WAS INCLUDED IN HER TAXABLE COMPENSATION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 6
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: BICSI, INC. HAS REGULAR MEMBERS WHO ARE AFFORDED THE RIGHT TO VOTE IN THE ELECTION OF THE GOVERNING BODY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 7A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ALL REGULAR MEMBERS ARE ELIGIBLE TO VOTE IN THE ELECTION OF THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: FORM 990 AND ACCOMPANYING SCHEDULES ARE PREPARED BY AN INDEPENDENT ACCOUNTING FIRM. FORM 990 AND ACCOMPANYING SCHEDULES ARE SENT ELECTRONICALLY TO ALL THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS FOR THEIR REVIEW AND APPROVAL. ALL QUESTIONS AND ISSUES ARE RESOLVED WITH THE INDEPENDENT ACCOUNTING FIRM PRIOR TO FILING WITH THE INTERNAL REVENUE SERVICE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: A CONFLICT OF INTEREST SHALL BE DEFINED AS ANY ACTIVITY, TRANSACTION, RELATIONSHIP, SERVICE, OR CONSIDERATION WHICH IS, OR APPEARS TO BE, CONTRARY TO THE BEST INTEREST OF BICSI, OR IN WHICH THE INTERESTS OF AN INDIVIDUAL OR ANOTHER ORGANIZATION HAS THE POTENTIAL TO BE PLACE ABOVE THOSE OF BICSI. ANY INTERESTED INDIVIDUAL MUST DISCLOSE THE EXISTENCE OF ANY ACTUAL OR POSSIBLE CONFLICT OF INTEREST AND ALL MATERIAL FACTS TO THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS CONSIDERING THE PROPOSED TRANSACTION. ACTION TO ADDRESS THE CONFLICT SHALL BE TAKEN BY EITHER THE INTERESTED INDIVIDUAL OR THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS. ALL BICSI OFFICERS, DIRECTORS, MEMBERS AND EMPLOYEES ACTING ON BEHALF OF BICSI SHALL ADHERE TO THE HIGHEST STANDARD OF ETHICAL CONDUCT AND AVOID ANY ACTIVITY OR SITUATION WHERE THEIR PERSONAL INTERESTS COULD CONFLICT, OR REASONABLY APPEAR TO CONFLICT, WITH THE BEST INTERESTS OF BICSI. EACH MUST SIGN THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY AND CONFIDENTIALITY AGREEMENT ONCE A YEAR. ANY VIOLATIONS ARE REPORTED TO THE ETHICS COMMITTEE WHO MONITOR AND ENFORCE THE POLICY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE COMPENSATION OF THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR/CEO IS REVIEWED AND APPROVED BY THE PRESIDENT AND PRESIDENT-ELECT OF BICSI. PERSONS WITH CONFLICTS OF INTEREST WITH RESPECT TO THE COMPENSATION AGREEMENT AT ISSUE ARE NOT INVOLVED IN THE REVIEW AND APPROVAL PROCESS AND AN ALTERNATIVE BICSI OFFICER WILL BE APPOINTED TO PARTICIPATE IN DETERMINING THE COMPENSATION IF SUCH CONFLICT EXISTS. THE COMPENSATION OF THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR/CEO IS REVIEWED AND APPROVED USING DATA FROM THIRD PARTIES AS TO COMPARABLE POSITIONS AT SIMILARLY SITUATED ORGANIZATIONS. THE MOST RECENT COMPENSATION STUDY REVIEW WAS CONDUCTED DURING THE 2020-2021 FISCAL YEAR. THE COMPENSATION FOR ALL OTHER STAFF IS DETERMINED BY THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR/CEO.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 18
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: FORM 1023 AND FORM 990 ARE MADE AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC UPON REQUEST.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: BICSI MAKES A COPY OF FILING DOCUMENTS AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC UPON REQUEST.

THIS AMENDED RETURN IS FILED PURSUANT TO THE IRS DELINQUENT INTERNATIONAL INFORMATION RETURN SUBMISSION PROCEDURES TO INCLUDE A PREVIOUSLY OMITTED FORM 5471 AND FORM 8992. REASONABLE CAUSE STATEMENT AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST.
